name: Gardner
message: 痛っ‥‥‥‥足首をひねってしまったようだ。

name: Jonathan
message: Are you okay？
Looks like we managed to get away somehow.

name: Gardner
message: What the hell is that guy...

name: Jonathan
message: Professor, look at this.
The show window's been trashed.

name: Gardner
message: I doubt there was anything that valuable on display anyway.
At the very least, there's nothing here worth risking going to prison for.

name: Jonathan
message: What the hell happened to Arkham?
It's like we're the only ones in the whole village.

name: Gardner
message: Maybe everyone was eaten by that monster！　　　　　　　　Who cares about that anyway‥‥‥‥‥

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, what’s that you’ve got there？
It looks like the gun Thomas had, but weren't there no bullets in it?

name: Jonathan
message: Ah, I guess I grabbed it without thinking.
Something　like　this,　without　any　ammo　it's　worth　about　as　much　as　a　random　rock　lying　around.

name: Gardner
message: この店に弾があるかもしれんじゃないか。
Let's go in.

name: Jonathan
message: こいつは酷い‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: Looks like they went on a rampage, wrecking everything in sight.
Were they looking for something?

name: Gardner
message: I wasn't close enough with the owner here to feel sorry for him.
You don't need to worry about it.
私の力をもってしても動かす事は至難の業だった、旧式の大きくて重いレジスターが何者かの手によって倒されてしまっている。
It's hard to believe a human could do it, but I guess if someone was blinded by greed, they could pull something like that off without a second thought.
The cash register lying on its side has had its lock pried open, and the bills and coins inside are scattered all over the place.
The shopkeeper Hans hasn't shown himself, but I wonder what kind of face he'd make if he saw this.
店に忍び込んだ盗人は、商品にはあまり興味がなかったようで、荒らされた棚から消えた品物はあまりないようだ。
Maybe they thought there was no point in going out of their way to steal cans of soup or beans.
There shouldn't have been any alcohol, so it's probably vinegar or something.
Last time I saw them, there were a few lined up neatly, but now only some of them are just lying around.
I picked up a box about the size of a slightly enlarged matchbox.
It's a lot heavier than it looks.
I wonder what's inside.

name: Jonathan
message: Got it, it's ammo.
Inside the box, iron bullets with a dull sheen are packed tightly, pointed downward with their warheads.
Thomas's gun seems to be a six-shooter, so with this many, even if the magazine runs empty, he should be able to reload it a few times.
I loaded the gun with awkward hands.
When I pull back the heavy slide, there's a click and I know a bullet's been loaded into the chamber.
The gun suddenly feels heavier, but there's no doubt it's just an illusion caused by the unbelievable fact that this little device can so easily take someone's life.

name: Jonathan
message: I've shot rabbits with a hunting rifle before, but this is the first time I've ever held such a small gun.

name: Gardner
message: You're better off than me. I've never even held a gun in my whole life.

name: Jonathan
message: This is the latest American-made model, huh.
Looks like it's been used a lot, so Thomas must have been using his gun pretty damn often.

name: Gardner
message: I don't like killing, you know.
Even　if　it's　a　monster　I've　never　seen　before.

name: Jonathan
message: You really think something like this can kill him？

name: Gardner
message: さて、私には解らんがね。

name: Gardner
message: What is it？

name: Jonathan
message: どうかしたんですか。

name: Gardner
message: Just now, I think I heard some kind of noise......

name: Jonathan
message: It's him...

name: Gardner
message: The guy who was at the Fish Scale Inn earlier！

name: Jonathan
message: No, there's no way‥‥‥‥‥

name: Gardner
message: Anyway, just do something about it！

name: Jonathan
message: Looks like I managed to kill it...

name: Gardner
message: If this guy wasn't the one who was at the Fish Scale Inn, then just how many more of them are there in the village?

name: Jonathan
message: さあ‥‥‥私とコーデリアが見た時は何百という数が　　　　　　　　集まっていましたが。

name: Gardner
message: No way! You gotta be kidding me!
Hurry up and get out of this village.

name: Jonathan
message: You can't leave Cordelia behind！

name: Gardner
message: Of course, we have to save that girl from Thomas.　　　　　　　　We'd better hurry.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's head back to the Fish Scale Inn first.
I can't exactly run away from the village dressed like this.
There's a box, about one size bigger than a matchbox, with no label.
It's really covered in dust, so you can tell it's been sitting on the store shelf for a long time.
I've never bought bullets or anything like that...
I wonder what kind of bullets go into a gun this size.
They didn't seem like they were planning to steal anything, so this kind of rampage is weird.
It looked like they were enjoying wrecking the nicely organized store.
